column1: Note: Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Inmates could have been in prison for more than one offense; the most serious one is reported in this table. See appendix table 9 for standard errors.
a/Includes cases in which the type of homicide was unspecified, not shown separately.
b/Includes 0.8% of cases in which the prisoner’s most serious offense was unspecified.
